songs.title: Anytime You Need a Friend
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Ally & Normani &(All)]
Oh, oh
If you're lonely and need a friend
Troubles seem like they never end
Just remember to keep the faith
(Ah, ah)
And love will be there to guide the way

[Chorus: All & Camila]
Anytime you need a friend
I'll be here
You'll never be alone again
So don't you fear
Even if I'm miles away
I'm by your side
(Oh, oh)
Don't you ever be lonely
Love will make it alright

[Verse 2: Lauren & Dinah & (All)]
When the shadows are closing in
And your spirit diminishing
Just remember you're not alone
(Ah, ah)
And love will be there to guide you home

[Chorus: All & (Camila)]
Anytime you need a friend
I'll be here (I will be here)
You'll never be alone again
(You'll never be alone again)
So don't you fear
Even if I'm miles away
(Even if I'm miles)
I'm by your side
(Don't you ever be lonely
Love will make it alright)
